playn.core

Class GL20.Buffers

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.GL20.Buffers
  • Enclosing class:
    GL20

    public abstract static class GL20.Buffers
extends Object
    A helper class for bridging between Java arrays and buffers when implementing GL20.
